meanings.definition: Not restrained by handcuffs or other physical restraints.
meanings.sent1: The suspect was uncuffed after proving his innocence.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved when the handcuffs were uncuffed from her wrists.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved being uncuffed in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like being uncuffed from worry and fear.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of freedom when uncuffed was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: Not having a folded or rolled-up cuff, as in clothing.
meanings.sent1: He preferred uncuffed jeans for a casual look.
meanings.sent2: The uncuffed sleeves of the shirt gave it a modern style.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer showcased a new line of uncuffed pants.
meanings.sent4: Her uncuffed dress flowed elegantly as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The uncuffed hem of the skirt added a touch of simplicity.

meanings.definition: Not having a cuff or border, as in a sleeve or pant leg.
meanings.sent1: The uncuffed sleeve of the jacket gave it a unique touch.
meanings.sent2: She liked the uncuffed pant legs for a more relaxed fit.
meanings.sent3: The tailor specialized in creating uncuffed sleeves.
meanings.sent4: The uncuffed edges of the blanket added a cozy feel.
meanings.sent5: The uncuffed collar of the shirt felt comfortable against his neck.
